name: medus_ally_01
text: Stone already, Tiny? I like that.

name: medus_begin_01
text: Tremble, vermin, before the stony gaze of the Gorgon.
text_simple: tremble vermin before the stony gaze of the gorgon

name: medus_begin_02
text: Their deaths will be swift and cold as stone.
text_simple: their deaths will be swift and cold as stone

name: medus_begin_03
text: Gaze upon Medusa's beauty, and despair!
text_simple: gaze upon medusas beauty and despair

name: medus_bottle_01
text: Whatever will I do with you?
text_simple: whatever will i do with you

name: medus_cast_01
text: Let my beauty still your breath.
text_simple: let my beauty still your breath

name: medus_cast_02
text: Come, my pets, your feast awaits.

name: medus_cast_03
text: I am the last thing you'll see.

text: Even a severed head can bite.

name: medus_firstblood_01
text: First blood, and it came so easily.

name: medus_firstblood_02
text: First blood-I like to start with dessert.

name: medus_inthebag_01
text: Now, where did I put my snakeskin bag? Because this one, my friends, is in it!

text: You can't vanquish what you can't see.

name: medus_kill_02
text: That'll teach you to try outstaring a snake.
text_simple: thatll teach you to try outstaring a snake

name: medus_kill_03
text: So puny, I hardly had to unhinge my jaw.

text: My beauty fills your dying eyes.
text_simple: my beauty fills your dying eyes

name: medus_kill_08
text: There is no heart colder than mine.

name: medus_kill_09
text: Don't resist the cobra, little bird.

name: medus_levelup_01
text: Stronger with every skin I shed.

name: medus_levelup_04
text: It won't be long now, sisters.

text: Ha ha ha ha ha ha!

text: Ah, the wind in my serpents!

name: medus_lose_03
text: I bring shame upon the Gorgons.
text_simple: i bring shame upon the gorgons

name: medus_lose_05
text: All for nothing. Gorgons, I have failed you.

text: Find me a mirror, and I'll end it all.

text: Hide my face, my pretty pets.

name: medus_purch_01
pretty_criteria:
Buying an expensive item

name: medus_purch_04
text: Is it creepy that I have a snakeskin purse?
text_simple: is it creepy that i have a snakeskin purse

name: medus_rare_01
text: I traded useless beauty for the power to wreak my vengeance.
text_simple: i traded useless beauty for the power to wreak my vengeance

name: medus_rare_02
text: Do I mourn for my lost loveliness? No.
text_simple: do i mourn for my lost loveliness no

name: medus_rare_03
text: I am never alone. My pets hiss around my head, comfort and reminder of my cold and vengeful road.
text_simple: i am never alone my pets hiss around my head comfort and reminder of my cold and vengeful road

name: medus_rare_04
text: Gorgons, sisters, forgive my infirmity. I grow stronger day by day, and I will come for you.
text_simple: gorgons sisters forgive my infirmity i grow stronger day by day and i will come for you

name: medus_rare_05
text: When I was beautiful, I never knew what I was missing.
text_simple: when i was beautiful i never knew what i was missing

name: medus_rare_06
text: Never come between a Gorgon and her sisters. I will turn your blood and bone to stone, and shatter you into a thousand remorseful shards.
text_simple: never come between a gorgon and her sisters i will turn your blood and bone to stone and shatter you into a thousand remorseful shards

name: medus_rare_07
text: The only real beauty is power.
text_simple: the only real beauty is power

name: medus_respawn_06
text: Gorgons, I won't fail you again!
text_simple: gorgons i wont fail you again

name: medus_respawn_09
text: I'm having a bad hair day.
text_simple: im having a bad hair day

name: medus_respawn_10
text: The Gorgon's gaze will petrify them all!
text_simple: the gorgons gaze will petrify them all

name: medus_rival_01
text: Never run your finger through my hair.
text_simple: never run your finger through my hair

name: medus_rival_02
text: I thought my gaze might turn you to flesh.
text_simple: i thought my gaze might turn you to flesh

name: medus_rival_04
text: Even stone is not immune to my fangs.
text_simple: even stone is not immune to my fangs

name: medus_rival_06
text: Meet a real snake, you eel.
text_simple: meet a real snake you eel

name: medus_rival_07
text: You're still wet behind the ears.
text_simple: youre still wet behind the ears

name: medus_rival_08
text: Wriggle back to the water, little fish.
text_simple: wriggle back to the water little fish

name: medus_rival_12
text: The Slithereen Guard fails at last.
text_simple: the slithereen guard fails at last

name: medus_rival_13
text: Sink like a stone into the depths.
text_simple: sink like a stone into the depths

name: medus_rival_14
text: Leave the snake magic to the experts, Shaman.
text_simple: leave the snake magic to the experts shaman

name: medus_rival_15
text: I know a thing or two about working stone.
text_simple: i know a thing or two about working stone

name: medus_rival_16
text: Oh, I mistook you for a fire hydra.
text_simple: oh i mistook you for a fire hydra

name: medus_rival_17
text: Ice cracks, the same as stone.
text_simple: ice cracks the same as stone

name: medus_rival_18
text: Shame I can't look you in the eye.
text_simple: shame i cant look you in the eye

name: medus_rival_20
text: What a failure of a god.
text_simple: what a failure of a god

name: medus_rival_21
text: Tell your brothers I said hello.
text_simple: tell your brothers i said hello

name: medus_rival_23
text: Oh, Phoenix, I should have known you'd go out with a bang.
text_simple: oh phoenix i should have known youd go out with a bang

name: medus_rival_24
text: Didn't you know snakes are cold-blooded?
text_simple: didnt you know snakes are coldblooded

name: medus_stonegaze_11
text: Look at me when I kill you.
text_simple: look at me when i kill you

name: medus_win_04
text: Load up all the vanquished for my rock garden.
text_simple: load up all the vanquished for my rock garden

name: medus_win_05
text: That's what triumph tastes like, my pretty pets.
